title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles classic logo
content:
I'm looking for the font in which 'Teenage Mutant Ninja' is set... Any ideas?  
 [http://sciencefiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/tumblr\_mcqv1cxfA01q...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415055012/http:/sciencefiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/tumblr_mcqv1cxfA01qfklhjo1_1280-1024x472.png "http://sciencefiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/tumblr\_mcqv1cxfA01qfklhjo1\_1280-1024x472.png")
author: ill sans

comments.content: Neo Sans Black from Monotype looks like a good fit. It may be a hand lettered variation of something like that.
